title: I Am Going To Be Permabanned
body:
I accidentally clicked "Create A Discussion," so I will make a tl;dr of what I wrote.

I am currently trying to climb to Gold (I'm Silver 2 atm). Some of my teammates make poor decisions, and I try not to flame them so I can climb. But I just have to hard flame some people because they lack too many brain cells to make good decisions (not that I'm perfect, but I try to make fewer mistakes). And when I flame them, I will probably get reported for it. And, I "probably" deserve the report. But, at the end of the day, if you keep on making poor decisions in my game, I'm not going easy on you. I'm trying to climb, not carry your dumbass.

I will accept my permaban, however, I will quit if I get permabanned.

>Removed by Moderation>

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Welp, it doesnt really seem like OP wants to have a conversation here about behaviour. As such Im going to lock this one up.

Also another note to OP, insults directed at anyone (including moderators) are not appropriate on Boards, so I have edited your original post to remove such in the process of locking it.
I think we will manage.
What do you mean by "we?"

> [{quoted}](name=BradNo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i86zxhpr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-22T15:30:15.510+0000)
>
> What do you mean by "we?"

"We" as in the players. If you will get banned, then so be it, but don't act like it's not your own fault for not following the rules.
Lol, I don't care about the shit playerbase, anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=BradNo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=i86zxhpr,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-22T15:36:47.743+0000)
>
> Lol, I don't care about the shit playerbase, anyway.

Oh, i know. I remember your comments.
Well, it's not that bad in silver. The team I get is alright compared to Bronze. Iron and Bronze players are what is wrong with the community.

pfft. About 1/4 of the player base in Silver and Gold are what's wrong with the community, from the terms of toxicity. Case and point is this entire thread.

It's as you said: these people, including you, should know what they're doing...whether it's right for the game, whether they made a mistake, whether they need to take a break to not go full demon mode in all chat and waste 27 minutes of everybody's lives...

But those people can't take ANY responsibility for a loss, or criticism for even a single, small mistake, because IT CAN NOT BE THEIR FAULT if they lose or if it looks like they're going to lose. They're just too competitive and egotistical

Or, in the case of players like you, because you don't CARE if it's your fault, as long as people you *personally* blame don't win their game. You play god, plain and simple. The total god-complex, "you don't deserve this win" types are BY FAR the worst.

Bronze and Iron are learning. They're low for a reason, and even though they share a lot of the same behaviors, I could argue they *learned* them from the **true** villains. Silver and Gold know things, but some get all elitist whenever literally anything goes wrong, and throw half their games being tilted instead of trying to make a comeback. Or more, if they decide the only way to get people to notice their effort is to babyrage to the boards about how they're about to get perma'd from "other people's lack of ability."

At the risk of getting myself into trouble, let me recite the Deep Magic of gamers, just this once, to tell you clearly: "Good. Go back to Runescape. We don't need or want you here anyway."

It's actually messiah-complex, my dude.

PS: Who TF DO YOU THINK I AM. Give me a tl;dr. I'm not reading all of this.

Want your tl;dr? Go to the last line.

But you already read it all anyway, if you bothered to "correct" me. Right? :)

Later, troll.

Lets answer your question with this question....

Do you believe flaming someone is going to help them make better decisions?

Here is another question...

Do you think it is more likely for someone who is tilted (yourself or the person who is being flamed) to make worse decisions?

You're far better off just not flaming your team, even if they are making poor decisions. If you can say something that constructive, it MIGHT be taken as helpful and MIGHT lead to better choices for both you and your teammates, .. but if not, it is actually more likely to contribute to hurting your chances of success.
The thing is, some Silver players don't listen to anyone but themselves. Even if I ping them to do something, they still won't listen. So, I really don't care at this point.
If they played better as a team and didn't make lots of mistakes... They wouldn't be silver... That's what's on both teams, you just have to be consistently a little better.
The problem is, some silver players SHOULD be bronze and not on my team.
To be honest, your willingness to engage in some of the other comment threads under this post tells me that the real issue has nothing to do with the skills of the other players on your team.
The issue was never the skill of the players on my team. The issue is my teammates' decision-making.

Which includes your decision making. .. such as your comments toward your teammates. .. which is what you are concerned with being banned for. 

However, as evident in other comments, you also seem willing to engage in dialogue with someone who is simply trying to troll you, .. therefore their skills / decisions have nothing to do with it.
That's not what I meant by decision-making and you know it. Stop acting dumb.

I'm not "acting dumb" .. You're ignoring the real problem. 

You can not blame your behavior on other people. 

YOU are the one who is flaming your team. YOU are the one who will be punished for it. 

Change YOUR behavior, .. or don't, and get banned.
I'm not BLAMING my teammates about my behavior. WHAT. DON'T. YOU. GET. ABOUT. IT.
You seem to be not listening to anyone but yourself.
People usually don't have a problem with how I play, so I don't really have to listen to them. Plus, I'm the jungler, so I am the shot caller, mostly.
What's the purpose of this thread?
what's the purpose of this comment?

To ask you the purpose of the thread.

I mean, you're not really asking a question, and your tone doesn't suggest that you want input on your mind set, so I don't really see what you're trying to accomplish here.
I'm not an attention-[redacted] like you.
This thread would beg to differ, no?
I don't know you that well.
lucky you
I've got the flu, it's a bitch and a half to do much else the past few days.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you get better.

but...

you made a thread...
It's a dump thread, kinda. The Mods / Heralds will remove it, anyway.
what's the purpose of this reply?
what's the purpose of your existence?
the purpose is to enjoy it and then go back to sleep like a good little soldier
Fair Enough.

Don't see the point of flaming, why would anyone want to further tilt a TEAMMATE who may be doing bad...? It's not going to help anything and will end in things like this thread.

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
If my teammates are trash, flaming them won't make them less trash, now will it?
Bye
I'm not permabanned yet, dummy.

Indeed. You can't play poorly and be making mistakes and expect people to react positively or act with indifference, that's bull shit.

Really, just don't be excessive or severe with your flame and you should be fine... unless you're currently out of a 14 day ban and thus on "thin ice", you need to only type positively or neutrally for now
Hell no. I'm going for on Sicko Mode on trash players.
